summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kitchenry new features (iteration 3): Recipe Favorites, Recipe Scaling, and Recipe Print. All 39 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified with all new features working correctly.
passed_tests: Recipe Favorites - POST /api/recipes/{id}/favorite toggles favorite status
Recipe Favorites - GET /api/favorites returns user's favorite recipes
Recipe Favorites - GET /api/recipes with favorites_only=true filter
Recipe Favorites - Recipe response includes is_favorite field
Recipe Favorites - Favoriting non-existent recipe returns 404
Recipe Scaling - GET /api/recipes/{id}/scaled?servings=8 doubles ingredients
Recipe Scaling - GET /api/recipes/{id}/scaled?servings=2 halves ingredients
Recipe Scaling - Fraction handling (1/2 cup * 2 = 1 cup)
Recipe Scaling - Minimum servings (1) works
Recipe Scaling - Invalid servings (0, negative) rejected with 422
Recipe Scaling - Scaling non-existent recipe returns 404
Recipe Print - GET /api/recipes/{id}/print returns print-formatted data
Recipe Print - Response includes total_time calculation
Recipe Print - Printing non-existent recipe returns 404
Frontend - Favorites filter button on recipes list page
Frontend - Import button on recipes list page
Frontend - Favorite button (heart icon) on recipe detail page
Frontend - Print button (printer icon) on recipe detail page
Frontend - Servings +/- controls scale recipe ingredients
Frontend - '(was X)' indicator shows original servings
Frontend - '(scaled for X servings)' text in ingredients header
All previous iteration tests (auth, platform import, LLM settings, notifications, etc.)
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Scaling Recipe with multiple ingredients for scaling tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features fully tested: 1) Recipe Favorites - toggle via POST /api/recipes/{id}/favorite, get all via GET /api/favorites, filter via favorites_only=true param. 2) Recipe Scaling - GET /api/recipes/{id}/scaled?servings=X returns scaled ingredients with proper fraction handling. 3) Recipe Print - GET /api/recipes/{id}/print returns print-formatted data with total_time. Frontend has heart icon for favorites, printer icon for print, +/- buttons for scaling with live ingredient updates.
